name: Treasures of Bloom
description:
Controls:
Mouse Movement: rotate player
Mouse Left: grappling hook
Space: swim faster
R: restart

Explore the blue depths of the neon-lit sea in this relaxing diving adventure. Collect three buoys, find the treasure chest and bring it to the surface.

Use your trusty grappling hook to defy enemies and to move around faster.

But do not let the beautiful environment fool you: if you run out of air, you have a serious problem!

Game Idea + Technical Arts: Benjamin Stahr

Programming: Fenno Boomgaarden (https://boomgaarden.itch.io/)

Arts: Ugghmaster

Music: Minor Seven (https://germanjazzguy.itch.io/)
